comment: A great professor. Super sweet guy who grades very easily.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Hilarious--Graded by few things

comment: Dr. Stafford made public speaking fun. I was very nervous when the class started, but he made it easy to settle in and become comfortable. He really knows public speaking and tells great stories that are relevant to the lecture. He is very easy going and laid back. I highly recommend this teacher to anyone wanting fun public speaking!

Dr. Stafford is the best professor I've had since I've been at KSU. He is so engaged and he really makes you want to be there. I never wanted to miss a class. His grading is very fair and he is very clear about how he is going to grade you. Easy A! Just practice your speech. Don't hold notecards in two hands and DONT LEAN ON THE PODIUM!
Prof. Stafford is a great professor. Knows his stuff and is very helpful and approachable. A very easy A. Do take him!!!

Just had my first class, meet once a week on Wednesdays. What an AMAZING professor, I can already tell that I'm going to learn a lot from him. He made those 3 hours fly by, literally. He genuinely wants to make you succeed and he loves what he does. I'm so glad I chose him for my teacher for Public Speaking. YOU SHOULD TOO!

Dr Stafford rawked my face off!  He is probably the most engaged proffessor, and overall best I have ever had. He will work well with any skill level you come to his class with!  He does a great job breaking the ice between the class, and making you feel comfortable.  Go to class! rehearse your speeches, AND ABOVE ALL ELSE DON'T TOUCH THE PODIUM!

Prof Stafford teaches by example, not by lecturing out of a book. He does work with speaking engagements and commercial voiceovers so he knows what he's talking about. He is very friendly and supportive, even (and especially) to timid people who are terrified of speaking. I highly recommend him for Public Speaking.

Easy A class... Stafford is very liberal minded and doesn't mind pushing his opinions on the class.  He loves to talk about himself.  If you can get past that, though, you'll see that he really does care about his students and helps everyone become confident with public speaking.
He is amazing! The best teacher I have had so far. I was actually sad when the semester was over because our class was done. Great guy, fatherly if you will
Grades really easy...as long as ya show up it's an easy A.  Get him for public speaking....he is a great teacher.  Very encouraging and helpful.  He gets an "A" definetely:)
Over the top. You cling to every word he lectures. Most effective teacher I've ever had...ever!
